title: Financial Analyst Interview Guide
description: Demonstrate financial modeling and analytical expertise.

content.text: Financial Analyst interviews assess your financial modeling skills, analytical capabilities, and business acumen. Expect technical questions on accounting, valuation, and scenario-based case studies.

**What interviewers assess:**

- Financial statement analysis
- Modeling and forecasting skills
- Valuation methodologies
- Business and industry knowledge
- Excel and analytical tool proficiency

**Typical FA interview loop:**

1. **Recruiter screen** (30 min)
2. **Hiring manager screen** (60 min)
3. **Onsite/Virtual loop** (3-5 hours):
   - Technical accounting/finance round
   - Modeling exercise or case study
   - Business case presentation
   - Behavioral round
Be ready for Excel-based modeling tests. Know shortcuts, can build models from scratch, and explain your assumptions clearly.

items.text: Practice DCF and comparable company analysis
Brush up on Excel shortcuts and formulas
Prepare examples of analysis that drove decisions
Review industry trends and key metrics
